Weather Vocabulary

 

Let's learn some words to talk about weather. We'll use these in the next lesson to explore tense.

Vocabulary Section 1
 

Taligisg'g?

What is the weather like?

 
 

Etug getu' gaqtugawig.

It might thunder.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What is visible?

 
 

Emaptoq.

Tracks.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What is the weather like?

 
 

Wasoq'tesg aq gaqtugawig.

Thunder and lightning.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What is visible?

 
 

'Tgu'g.

Waves.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What is the weather like?

 
 

'Msi'gug

Hail

 
 

Tami na tet?

Where is this?

 
 

Nipugtug.

Woods.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What is the weather like?

 
 

Epteg.

Hot.

 
 

Taliula'gw?

 
 

Weliula'gw.

Nice evening.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What is the weather like?

 
 

Saqaniaq.

Melting.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What is the weather like?

 
 

Pesaq.

Snowing.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'g?

What is visible?

 
 

Etlpanigs'g.

Drifting snow.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What is the weather like?

 
 

Gigpesaq.

Raining.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What is visible?

 
 

Wenji'guom aq tepgunset.

A full moon.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What is the weather like?

 
 

Ewlams'n nemi'g aq elt wasoq'tesg.

Looks like tornadoes and lightning.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What is visible?

 
 

Ewlams'n.

A tornado.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Na'gu 'setewig aq alugwiaq.

Sunny and cloudy.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Mesie'waq.

Drizzle.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What is visible?

 
 

Sisguwig.

Muddy.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Ma 'munitge'g.

Very cold.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What is visible?

 
 

Miti'sg.

Trees.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Gigpesa'ji'g.

Showers.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What is visible?

 
 

Walqwan.

Rainbow.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Alugigisg'g.

Cloudy.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'un?

What is visible?

 
 

Nipugt aq gospem.

Woods and lake.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Gaqtugwawig.

Thundering.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'un?

What is visible?

 
 

Na'gu'set qalqwasiet.

The setting sun.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Na'gu'setewig.

Sunny.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'un?

What is visible?

 
 

Na'gu'set nemi'g.

I see the sun.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Tegigisg'g.

Cold.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What's visible?

 
 

'Mgumi'gnig nipug.

Icy woods.

 
 

Talitge'g?

 
 

Tege'ji'jg.

Cool.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'un?

What is visible?

 
 

Gegpewisg.

Dew.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

U'nig.

Foggy.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Saqpigisg'g.

Foggy day.

 
 

Taliaq?

What's going on?

 
 

Mespo'qeg.

Flooding.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What's visible?

 
 

Wastew etlnujgma'q.

Melting snow.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Epteg.

Hot.

 
 

Taliag?

What's happening?

 
 

Nujgma'q wastew.

Melting snow.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Ewlansn wejgu'wet.

Hurricane.

 
 

Taligisg'g?

What's the weather like?

 
 

Etlwasoqotesg.

Lightning.

 
 

Goqwei nemitu'n?

What's visible?

 
 

Maqtawamugsit tepgnuset.

A dark moon.
